name: Video Game Tutorial
description:
A game about video game genres
Video Game Tutorial offers you to look at genres from a new perspective: you will find descriptions of various genres, their demonstration and discoursing about them. Sometimes, however, not the serious ones.

Unique gameplay
Each genre presented has its own feature: a unique character development system in a platformer level, an outstanding artificial intelligence in a horror level, a special way of determining characteristics of your character in a visual novel and so on.

Various locations
Specialty of Video Game Tutorial allows the player to appear in various places with completely different conditions each level. Enjoy this!

And much more...
Which you can explore yourself.
